item.title: Kevin Kelly的103条建议
item.author: EricZhao
item.description: 之前写过一篇Kevin Kelly的68条建议，这不今年老爷子70岁生日，又来推荐人生建议了😀。 About 99% of the time, the right time is right now. 大约99%的时间里，最好

item.title: Kevin Kelly的68条建议
item.author: EricZhao
item.description: Kevin Kelly 2020年在他68岁生日时给年轻人提的68条建议： Learn how to learn from those who disagree with you or even offend you. See if you can find truth in what they believe. 接受不同理念的人，并向他们学习。 Being enthusiastic is
